title: Silly symphonies
brief_description: Three Walt Disney cartoon classics from the Silly Symphony series which are sure to enchant and delight children of all ages. Walt Disney’s “Silly Symphonies” were produced over a ten-year period from 1929-1939 and have managed to continue charming and entertaining viewing audiences of all ages into the 21st century.
